author: Staff Reporter
text:
While celebrating New Year, a group of youngsters went on a rampage, damaging tube lights and ceiling fans at the Pazhavanthangal railway station.

The Government Railway Police are on the lookout for the group who were reportedly returning home after celebrating New Year’s day in the city.

Sources said more than 20 youngsters were seen shouting ‘Happy New Year’ to train passengers.

Search on for offenders

Not stopping with that, they went around breaking 25 tube lights and ceiling fans on the station platform. A case has been registered and a search is on for the youth who had caused the damage.
title: Revellers damage lights, fans at railway station
